thread.title: Bautista brings hope, then heartache as Jays fall to Royals
thread.title_full: Bautista brings hope, then heartache as Jays fall to Royals

author: ROBERT MACLEOD
title: Bautista brings hope, then heartache as Jays fall to Royals
text:
Baseball Toronto Blue Jays right fielder Jose Bautista sits in the dugout during the seventh inning in Game 6 of baseball's American League Championship Series against the Kansas City Royals on Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Kansas City, Mo. (Matt Slocum/AP) Toronto Blue Jays right fielder Jose Bautista sits in the dugout during the seventh inning in Game 6 of baseball's American League Championship Series against the Kansas City Royals on Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Kansas City, Mo.(Matt Slocum/AP) Bautista brings hope, then heartache as Jays fall to Royals Add to ...
